definition[0]: a company or person that provides a particular product
example[0]: the UK’s largest supplier of office equipment
definition[1]: a company that provides a particular type of product
example[1]: What the retailer needs is a larger supplier base in order to be more competitive.
example[2]: Microsoft is the world’s largest supplier of PC software.
example[3]: With California’s orange crop halved, local suppliers have had to find alternative sources.
